meanings.definition: Not attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The old, unpretty house stood out among the colorful ones on the street.
meanings.sent2: She felt unpretty in her old, faded dress.
meanings.sent3: The unpretty scarecrow in the field made the birds laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unpretty truth was finally revealed, causing shock and disbelief.
meanings.sent5: The unpretty painting captured the raw emotion of the artist.

meanings.sent1: The unpretty flower wilted in the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The unpretty room had peeling wallpaper and dusty furniture.
meanings.sent3: His unpretty attempt at a joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unpretty reality of the situation hit her hard.
meanings.sent5: The unpretty melody echoed through the empty hallways.
